metadata.title: CVE-2013-4565 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the __OLEdecode function in ppthtml 0.5.1 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) andpossibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted .ppt file.

criterions.comment: xlhtml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
